Package ATM.Entities

Class Card

java.lang.Object
ATM.Entities.Card
public class Card extends Object
Object that gets passed around to encode the information required for cards

    • checkPin

      public boolean checkPin​(String inputPin)
      Verify the input pin is correct. Will block card if more than three calls are made.
      Parameters:
      inputPin - the pin input by user
      Returns:
      true if successful the pins match and unblocked, false otherwise

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks that the card is between its issue and expiry dates and has not been reported stolen or lost.
      Returns:
      Whether the card is valid or not

    • getCardInfo

      @Nonnull public static Card getCardInfo​(String cardNumber) throws ATMException
      Query the database to get the card info and return a populated Card object with this info. Also validates the card and sets the status
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The card's number (5 digits)
      Returns:
      A populated Card object
      Throws:
      ATMException

    • retrieveLinkedAccountNumbers

      public static List<String> retrieveLinkedAccountNumbers​(String cardnum) throws ATMException
      Retrieves all associated account numbers to a card
      Parameters:
      cardnum - The card's number
      Returns:
      A list of strings of account numbers
      Throws:
      ATMException

    • setReason

      public void setReason​(String reason)
      Sets reason variable in the case of the card being invalid. Results in hasReason() returning true.
      Parameters:
      reason - String
